sentences.sentence: The school provides an excellent allround education.
sentences.translation: 这所学校提供一流的全面教育。

sentences.sentence: ABS resin is a kind of thermoplastic resin with excellent allround properties.
sentences.translation: ABS树脂是一种综合性能优异的热塑性树脂。

sentences.sentence: Founded in 2003, Republic (Beijing) book Co., Ltd. is an allround "book planner".
